Short Description: * How to use: In the box, you will receive a Customized Acrylic Lamp And Power Adapter, Wooden Base, Color Changing Remote in multicolor Acrylic Lamps  * (Tutorial video you can find below the product images).The song will be played on your phone after scanning the code from the lamp.

Sound will not come from the lamp you have to scan the Code from your SPOTIFY app and a song will pop up on your phone and you can listen to it from your phone. Enjoy and feel the moment.* You just have to connect your power adapter to a Wooden base and put your Acrylic Lamp over the base & It will Light up your room.* Materials: Acrylic, & MDF Wooden Base .
Product Description: * Wishing Happy Birthday just got special with this charming keepsake. Name Music Plaque With Occasion & Photo Acrylic 3D illusion LED Lamp with Color Changing Led and remote will prove to be the best gift for the recipient.

* Personalized with a name and make it a cherished memory that will stay imprinted forever. Made in acrylic, this is perfect to keep on your bedside table as a night lamp. It comes with easy to use remote.

* 2 Size Available : (Small Acrylic Lamp Size)-6 Height X 8 Length Inches, Wooden Base- 5.8 Length x 1.7 Width x 1 Height inches,(Big Acrylic Lamp Size)-8 Height X 10 Length Inches, Wooden Base- 9.6 Length x 1.7 Width x 1.1 Height inches.
* Once you place the order, you will receive a confirmation call. After that, the order will be placed. For any assistance, call or Whatsapp on ********** | ********** 11 AM to 6 PM.
Product Size: * 2 Size Available : (Small Acrylic Lamp Size)-6 Height X 8 Length Inches ,Wooden Base- 5.8 Length x 1.7 Width x 1 Height inches,(Big Acrylic Lamp Size)-8 Height X 10 Length Inches,Wooden Base- 9.6 Length x 1.7 Width x 1.1 Height inches.
Box Contents: Acrylic Lamp, MDF Wooden Base (Remote With only multicolor Lamps), & Power Adapter
Care Instructions: Care Instructions * Clean with wet wipes
* Do not use excess water while cleaning.
Delivery Information: For Prepaid Orders - Free Express Delivery Within 2 to 4 Working Days
For Cash On Delivery Orders - Standard Delivery Within 5 to 7 Working Days.
* After the order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking number that will help you in tracking your order.
* Deliveries may not possible on Sundays or on any other national holidays.
* Kindly provide your correct address for hassle-free deliveries.
NOTE: THE LAMP CAN NOT PLAY A SONG, IT IS JUST A PICTURE LAMP
